name: Pumpkin Escape (AccurateMrCoolDev)
description:
Navigate through two different foresty and magical worlds with moving platforms and floating rocks. Find all the campsites and light the campfires to activate the portal to escape!

Controls:

'W' - Move forward

'A' & 'D' - Turn the camera left and right respectively

'S' - Hard brake

'Space' - Jump

'Esc' - Exit

How to play:

Navigate the world and find all of the campsites. Jump on top of the campfires to light them—light all the campfires to activate the portal. Find the portal once activated and jump through it to escape! 

Campfires will emit light in either two colors once they are lit:

Yellow - Campfire is lit and checkpoint is active

Blue - Campfire is lit but checkpoint is inactive

Made for Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022 hosted by Firith Studio

#CozyAutumnGameJam2022

Assets used:

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/platformer-kit

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/nature-kit

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/halloween-free-pumpkin-101968
